TI: [Correlation of the minute waves of superslow activity and hippocampal temperature in altered function of the central nervous system].
AB: One-minute oscillations of the infraslow activity were recorded within the range of 0 to 1 Hz with indwelled electrodes in the rabbit hippocampus. The oscillations disappeared for 5-hour period after L-DOPA administration. The phenomenon could be prevented with ethimisol. A correlation was found between the amplitude of the infraslow oscillations and the temperature of the dorsal hippocampus in different states of the c. n. s. induced by catecholaminergic serotoninergic and cholinergic neurotropic substances.
TT: Sootnoshenie minutnykh voln sverkhmedlennoi aktivnosti i temperatury gippokampa pri izmenenii funktsional'nogo sostoianiia tsentral'noio nervnoi sistemy.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1982 May;68(5):583-90.
